title: Retro arcade device for Raspberry Pi
description: Pimoroni recently featured the Picade, a retro arcade machine powered by the popular Raspberry Pi board. The company is also currently offering a limited-time promotion that includes a free Raspberry Pi 4 8GB, a PSU, and a 32GB microSD card for storage. The display consists of a 10” IPS display with 1024 x 768 resolution […]
